mapper.select: SELECT * FROM category_attribute CA JOIN CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE CAV ON CA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX = CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX WHERE CA.CATEGORY_IDX = #{category}

SELECT CA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX, CA.CATEGORY_IDX, CA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_NAME, CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_IDX, CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_NAME FROM CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE CA JOIN CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE CAV ON CA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX = CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX WHERE CA.CATEGORY_IDX = #{category}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_IDX, P.PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION) PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION , P.PRICE, P.CATEGORY_IDX, P.CREATED_AT, P.UPDATED_AT FROM PRODUCT P WHERE P.CATEGORY_IDX = #{category} GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_IDX, P.PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION) , P.PRICE, P.CATEGORY_IDX, P.CREATED_AT, P.UPDATED_AT ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_IDX ASC
SELECT CATEGORY_IDX, CATEGORY_NAME, PARENT_CATEGORY_IDX, DEPTH FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_IDX = #{category}
SELECT * FROM CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE CA JOIN CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE CAV ON CA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX = CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX WHERE CA.CATEGORY_IDX = #{category}

SELECT P.PRODUCT_IDX, P.PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION) PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION , P.PRICE, P.CATEGORY_IDX
FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_ATTRIBUTE PA ON P.PRODUCT_IDX = PA.PRODUCT_IDX JOIN CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE CA ON P.CATEGORY_IDX = CA.CATEGORY_IDX JOIN CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE CAV ON PA.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_IDX = CAV.CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_IDX WHERE
P.PRODUCT_IDX IN
#{ productIdxList }
GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_IDX, P.PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION), P.PRICE, P.CATEGORY_IDX
ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_IDX ASC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_IDX, P.PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION) PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION , P.PRICE, P.CATEGORY_IDX, PI. PRODUCT_SFILE_NAME, C.CATEGORY_NAME
FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE PI ON P.PRODUCT_IDX = PI.PRODUCT_IDX
JOIN CATEGORY C ON P.CATEGORY_IDX = C.CATEGORY_IDX WHERE P.PRODUCT_IDX IN
#{ productIdxList }
GROUP BY P.PRODUCT_IDX, P.PRODUCT_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION), P.PRICE, P.CATEGORY_IDX, PI. PRODUCT_SFILE_NAME, C.CATEGORY_NAME
ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_IDX ASC
SELECT CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_IDX, CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX, CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_NAME FROM CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE WHERE CATEGORY_ATTRIBUTE_IDX = #{categoryAttributeIdx}
